entry.title: Red Star - Dry Active Yeast - 2 Lbs
entry.summary:
Vendor: Fleischmann's
Type: BAKING
Price: 8.99

Red Star - Dry Active Yeast - 2 Lbs

Reduce mixing time by 10%-30% and shorten rising time by up to 50% with this Instant dry yeast vacuum pack! This instant dry yeast saves you time and, ultimately, money!

Versatile enough to be used in a variety of bread-making processes with sugar levels up to 12%, it can be poured directly into a mixer, mixed with flour, or added at the beginning of a mixing process. All yeast, which acts as a leavening agent, converts sugars found in dough into carbon dioxide, causing the dough to expand. This process is what helps give bread the soft and airy texture we all know and love! 

Lesaffre Red Star bakers active dry yeast 2 lb. vacuum pack can be used in all yeast-leavened goods, making it a versatile option for any bakery, pizzeria, or restaurant! The airtight vacuum packaging helps to extend this yeast's already lengthy shelf life by keeping moisture out. When you're ready to use it, simply dissolve the yeast in warm water before adding it into your ingredient mixture!

Yeast converts sugars found in dough into carbon dioxide, causing the dough to expand. This process is what helps give bread the soft and airy texture we all know and love! This 2 lb. bag of active dry yeast is perfect for making pizza crust, round loaves, or long "French-style" breads.

This bag of instant dry yeast is perfect for making delicious bagels, croissants, donuts, and more
